title: MERN Stack Development Roadmap 2025
author: Prabhleen Singh
headline: Master the MERN stack: Your step-by-step guide to becoming a full-stack developer in 2025.
content:
by Prabhleen Singh on 2025-01-07

The MERN stack is a powerful combination of technologies for building modern web applications. It consists of MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. This roadmap will guide you step-by-step through the foundational concepts and hands-on projects needed to become a MERN stack developer.

Chapters

Foundations

Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Git.

  • HTML and CSS Basics

    Understand the structure and styling of web pages.

    • W3Schools - HTML Tutorial
    • W3Schools - CSS Tutorial

  • JavaScript Fundamentals

    Learn JavaScript basics such as variables, loops, functions, and DOM manipulation.

    • JavaScript.info
    • FreeCodeCamp - JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures

  • Version Control with Git

    Learn how to track changes in your code using Git.

    • Git Documentation
    • Learn Git Branching
